body.value:
Drag and Drop Customizeable Icon Boxes

Icon boxes are the easy way to implement beautiful icons in a meaningful way. A few dozen preset icon box layouts are ready to drop anywhere in your page. Customization is easier than ever with the Glazed Drag and Drop tools.

 

Glazed

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
 

Glazed

Element Not Found.

Preset Icon Box Layouts

Icon Box layouts come with ready-made drag anddrop elements for up to 5 different icon sizes and include mirrored layouts for creating directional design effects.
